class_c_08_history_01:
Greetings, my little students. It is time for our
final examination.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_08_history_02:
Summon your historical knowledge from the dark
recesses of your minds, and answer the questions.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_08_question_01:
1. What is the area within the Great Crater of
    Paldea called?

A) The Core Area
B) Area Zero
C) The Crater Area
class_c_08_question_02:
2. How many years ago was this
    academy founded?

A) 805 years ago
B) 806 years ago
C) 807 years ago
class_c_08_question_03:
3. Which of these did not appear in the Paldean
    fairy tale about the four treasures?

A) A vessel		B) A folding fan
C) A set of tablets		D) A set of beads
class_c_08_question_04:
4. Which Area Zero Expedition member wrote
    the record of the team’s activities?

A) Leif
B) Thief
C) Heath
class_c_08_question_05a:
5. How many years ago did Professor Sada invent
    Tera Orbs?

A) 20 years ago
B) 15 years ago
C) 10 years ago
class_c_08_question_05b:
5. How many years ago did Professor Turo invent
    Tera Orbs?

A) 20 years ago
B) 15 years ago
C) 10 years ago
class_c_08_history_03: Your time is up! Put your writing utensils down![VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_08_history_04:
You must excuse that last question. It is too
shallow and ridiculous to be on a history test,\r
but alas...the director forced me to include it.[VAR 0114(0027)]
class_c_08_history_05:
So ends our final examination. You may ask for
your scores at the school’s front desk.[VAR 0114(0027)]
